turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Starbucks in Ruidoso, New Mexico.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do have a specific location you would like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm new in town, and I don't know exactly where there are some nearby.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can find one for you, what was the city again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ruidoso, New Mexico.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i see there is one on sudderth drive, are you close to there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that will work good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to try the Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'd like to use whole milk with that, and an extra shot of espresso, too, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande cinnamon cloud macchiato with whole milk and an extra shot of espresso to be picked up at the starbucks on sudderth drive, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 8 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.
